pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Build (2017, TV show)$(br2)Used to craft Rogue's $(l:build/devices/sclash_driver_rogue)Sclash Driver (Rogue)$(/l)$(br2)Used to access Rogue's $(l:build/riders/rogue#rogue)base$(/l) form
